replies.body:
Uuhhhhh I think you mean Happy Birthday because it's mah friggin BIRTHDAAAAAAY!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

You were born on the 4th of July? {{item:3682}} It's the cake I'll never be able to make because I can't cook {{summoner:3}} that's why I'll just {{summoner:6}} to the local Starbucks and rob them of all their cheesecake using my gift card and {{summoner:4}} outta there ASAP! Overcoming the struggle of social anxiety in order to feed the BROPORO XD! {{champion:201}} {{item:2052}}

Ohmigosh! Lord knows I hate going out in public, so thanks for going through all that trouble to get me some cheesecake -om nom nom-

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
